Fourth, the bodhisattva of definite fall dwells in the stage of definite fall.
Fifth, the bodhisattva of definite correct practice dwells in the stage of definite correct practice.
Sixth, the bodhisattva of ultimate arrival dwells in the stage of ultimate arrival.
